data.name: Under Waves
data.detailed_description:
UNDER WAVES is a twin stick shooter inspired by 80's arcade games

FEATURES:


• A tribute to classics like Asteroids, Space Invaders and Geometry Wars.
• Endless arcade gameplay.
• Replayable, short mini-game.
• Battle your own highscore and global leaderboards.
• 80's inspired modern synthwave soundtrack.


Master dash habilities to evade responsive enemy action.



Collect power-ups, multipliers and energy crystals to increase power



Survive increasing waves of radioactive lifeforms in an under water arena.

GAMEPLAY:


• Endless enemies spawn randomly, each run is different.
• Difficulty increases along with progressing waves.
• A quirk: you are always slowly dying from radiation, get crystals to recharge your energy.
• Power-ups, multipliers and 9 different enemies.
• Quite short runs. Addicting "just one more run" gameplay.


UNDER WAVES will be available soon. WISHLIST NOW!


Soundtrack by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.

data.short_description: Under Waves is a twin-stick arena shooter mini-game inspired by arcade classics. Survive, killing endless waves of enemies, battling for high scores. Includes great 80's synthwave soundtrack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,26GHz Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M 256MB
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 175 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: 2,26GHz Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M 256MB
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: 1,4GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB
